contents.content:
[{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Hi, everyone, time for the band meeting","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:35"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Meeting time!!!
Big sis, if you're there, make a noise~","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:35"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "I am here, so shush","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:36"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "That's rare. Big sis not the first one to respond","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:36"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Was dealing with stuff late last night, didn't sleep too well","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:37"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Late last night!?!?
Could it be a boyfriend... >///<","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:37"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "... Gross","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:37"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "04_XD","IsImageClickable": false,"Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:37"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "OK, let's get back to the meeting XD","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:37"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "First the band name, final decision is the one Big sis came up with, crystal punk, everyone ok with this?","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:38"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Some of the letters are capitalized, it's Crystal PuNK","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:39"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Got it. I myself quite like this name. It has a nice ring to it","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:39"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "How bout CRYSTAL PUNK? Looks more impactful","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:39"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "All Caps names are everywhere, doesn't stand out","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:40"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "I know that XDDD I'm ok with the name~
The most important thing is that it's a band with you guys!","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:40"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "We are Crystal PuNK!! Our goal is the world stage!!","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:40"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "... If KAI's the one who said this, I would probably be really touched","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:41"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "That's a bit much
Alright, one thing done, next thing. 
Regarding other members, any thoughts or possible candidates?","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:41"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "I'll go first. Last time, I went on a LIVE and came across a pretty good bassist. He's pretty consistent; let's switch JOE out","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:42"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Agreed","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:42"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Wait, WTF XDDD
What about our goal of the world stage!!!!!","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:42"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Who said it's going to be with you? That guy's slap is incredible","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:43"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Looks like JOE you can leave in peace","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:43"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "NOOOOOOO~~~~","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:43"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Nah, just kidding. JOE, you mentioned about a guitarist you knew. Is he any good?","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:44"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Ah, right! I'll show you guys his solo!!
He's totally gonna be the next big thing!","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:44"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "[JOE has shared a link.]","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:45"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Holy cow... he's amazing... that's professional level stuff right there","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:48"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Amazing indeed. The sound is stable. The tone is smooth and clear even during shredding. How did you get to know him?","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:48"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "I actively harassed him ofc XD
We know each other pretty well now. Should I get him in this chat?","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:48"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Sure, but I have things to deal with tonight. How about tomorrow?","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:49"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "I think tomorrow's fine too. JOE, contact him. Invite him to this chat tomorrow night and we can continue the discussion then","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:49"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Understood! Yes Sir, leader!!!","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:50"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Can someone else be the leader instead... please...","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:50"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "05_QQ","IsImageClickable": false,"Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:50"}]

[{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "ミーティングしようぜ","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:35"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "ミーティングきたー！
姉御いるならワンって言って","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:35"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "なんでだよ
いるし","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:36"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "姉御のレスがこんなに遅いのも珍しいな","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:36"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "夜遅くまでやってたから眠いんだよね","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:37"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "ヤッてた！？！？
ぼくちんには刺激が強いぜ…(///△///)","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:37"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "…きも","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:37"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "04_XD","IsImageClickable": false,"Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:37"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "ごめんごめん（笑）
ミーティングしよ","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:37"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "バンド名だけど、姉御のを採用でいいよな？
crystal punk","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:38"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "大文字と小文字混ぜてCrystal PuNKね","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:39"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "俺はこの名前好きだな
ゴロがいい","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:39"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "CRYSTAL PUNKでもいいじゃん！","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:39"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "全部大文字じゃベタ過ぎ","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:40"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "分かったって（笑）俺はこの名前でいいと思うよー
てかみんなとバンドやれんならなんでもオッケー！","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:40"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "Crystal PuNK！世界へ向かって突き進め！","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:40"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "…KAIが言ってれば感動的なんだけどね","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:41"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "（笑）
次は他のメンバーについてな
誰か知り合いにいないか？","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:41"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "まずは俺から
この前ライブ行ったときにいい感じのベースを見かけた
安定感があっていい
JOEと交換するか","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:42"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "賛成","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:42"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "待て待て！
世界に向かって突き進む話はどうなったの！！！！！！！！","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:42"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "誰もお前とは約束してない
あっちのスラップやばかったわ","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:43"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "これでJOEも安心して世界に出て行けるね","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:43"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "やめてええええええええ","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:43"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "冗談はこれくらいにしておくか
JOEこの前言ってたギターどうなんだよ？","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:44"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "そうだった！
あいつのソロ送るちょっと待って！
まじで明日のスター！！って感じだから！","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:44"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "[JOEがURLを送信しました]","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:45"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "うわすご…プロレベルじゃん","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:48"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "すごいな、音も安定してる
早弾きも崩れてない
どうやって知り合ったんだよ？","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:48"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "ナンパしてきた（笑）
どう？スカウトする？","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:48"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "あたしは全然オッケー
でも今日は用事あるから明日？","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:49"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "俺も問題ない
向こうに聞いてみてくれ
明日ちょっと話そう","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:49"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "リーダー様様！かしこまりましたでやんすー！","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:50"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "リーダーは他のやつにしようぜ……","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:50"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "05_QQ","IsImageClickable": false,"Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:50"}]

[{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Hi,大家來開個樂團會議吧","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:35"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "開會開會!!!
大姐頭 在的話吱一聲~","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:35"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "吱什麼 在啦","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:36"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "真難得,大姐頭沒有第一個跳出來","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:36"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "昨天弄太晚了 沒睡好","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:37"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "弄太晚 難道是男朋友...>///<","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:37"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "...噁心","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:37"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "04_XD","IsImageClickable": false,"Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:37"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "好啦開會 XD","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:37"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "首先團名,決定是大姐頭取的crystal punk沒錯吧?","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:38"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "有幾個字是大寫喔 Crystal PuNK","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:39"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "好,先說我喜歡這個名字,唸起來很有節奏感","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:39"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "CRYSTAL PUNK也不錯阿 霸氣!!","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:39"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "都大寫沒特色ㄚ 不夠亮眼","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:40"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "我知道啦XDDD 名字我OK~
重點是跟你們一起組的團阿!","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:40"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "我們是Crystal PuNK!! 邁向世界!!","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:40"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "...如果KAI說這句 我應該會很感動","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:41"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "太誇張囉
好了下一件事,找其他樂手的部分,大家有沒有想法或人選","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:41"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "我先,我上次跑LIVE聽到一個不錯的BASS手,蠻穩的,把JOE換掉吧","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:42"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "贊成","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:42"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "○XDDD 說好的邁向世界呢!!!!!","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:42"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "誰跟你說好?對方slap超屌的","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:43"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "看來你JOE放心去吧","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:43"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "NOOOOOOO~~~~","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:43"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "玩笑到這.JOE你上次說你認識一個吉他手,可以用嗎","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:44"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "對對 給你們聽聽看他的solo!!
根本明日之星!","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:44"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "[JOE 傳送了一份連結。]","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:45"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "哇賽好厲害...職業級的吧","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:48"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "真的強,聲音很穩定,速彈時顆粒感也明顯 怎麼認識的?","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:48"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "當然是我主動騷擾他 XD
蠻熟的 要不要抓進來?","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:48"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "好阿 不過我今晚還有事 約明天?","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:49"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "我也覺得可以,JOE你問問看,明晚拉進來一起討論好了","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:49"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "OK!! 遵命團長!!!","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:50"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "拜託團長給其他人當吧...","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:50"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "05_QQ","IsImageClickable": false,"Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:50"}]

[{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "Hi~ 자, 그럼 밴드 회의를 시작해 볼까!","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:35"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "회의다!!!
누님, 계신다면 생존 신고 좀~","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:35"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "뭐라는 거야.
여기 있다고.","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:36"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "우리 두목님이 왠일이래? 
회의에 다 늦고 말이야","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:36"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "어제 밤 늦게까지 했다고. 제대로 잠도 못잤고.","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:37"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "밤 늦게까지?...설마 남자친구랑...>///<","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:37"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "...더러운 놈.","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:37"},{"MessageType": 3,"Image": "04_XD","IsImageClickable": false,"Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:37"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "자~ 그럼 다시 회의로 돌아가서~","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:37"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "우리 밴드명은 우리 두목이 정한 걸로 결정 한거야?
crystal punk.","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:38"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "몇개는 대문자로 써야 한다고. Crystal PuNK!","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:39"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "오케이~ 우선 난 이 이름이 굉장히 맘에 든다고. 발음할 때도 뭔가 운율이 느껴지지 않아?","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:39"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "그냥 전부 대문자로 박아버리면!? CRYSTAL PUNK! 개쩔지!!","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:39"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "다 대문자로 쓰면 뭔가 특색이 없어 보이잖아. 뭔가 눈에도 잘 안들어오는 느낌이고.","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:40"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "알겠습니다요! XDDD 그럼 이름은 나도 찬성~
중요한 건 너희랑 같이 팀을 이룰 멤버라고!","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:40"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "우리는 Crystal PuNK!! 세계 무대를 향해 나아가자!!","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:40"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "...그 말을 KAI가 했으면, 감동 먹었을 텐데.","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:41"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "하하! 오버하지 말라고.
자, 그렇다면 그 다음은 기타 포지션 말인데, 모두 추천하고픈 사람 있어?","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:41"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "나부터 말할게. 저번에 LIVE홀에 가서 꽤 괜찮은 
베이시스트를 봤거든. JOE를 쫓아내고 그 베이시스트를 영입하는 건 어떨까?","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:42"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "대찬성.","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:42"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "잠깐!! x소리 말라고! 다 같이 세계 무대를 향해 나가자며!!!!!","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:42"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "누가 다 같이래? 그리고 그 베이시스트 slap도 거의 미친놈 수준이라고.","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:43"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "JOE, 안심하라고. 우리가 대신 세계 무대에 서줄테니깐.","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:43"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "싫어어어어어어~~~~","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:43"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "농담은 여기까지 하고. JOE! 네가 예전에 알고 지낸다던 그 기타리스트는?","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:44"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "맞다! 걔 solo들려줄테니깐 들어보라고!!
분명 슈퍼스타가 될 인재야!","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:44"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "[JOE가 링크를 보낸다]","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:45"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "엄청나... 이건 그냥 프로급이잖아.","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:48"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "이 정도일 줄이야. 소리가 하나도 안 튀고 속주도 음 하나하나가 엄청 또렷하잖아...이 사람이랑 대체 어떻게 알게 된 거야?","UserName": "KAI","Avatar": "kai_os_02","Time": "PM 08:48"},{"MessageType": 1,"Content": "당연히 내가 엄청 앵겨붙었지!
꽤 친하다고! 어때? 납치해 와?","Avatar": "joe_os_02","Time": "PM 08:48"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "응. 근데 나 오늘 저녁에 일이 있어서.
내일 괜찮아?","UserName": "Cherry","Avatar": "cherry_os_02","Time": "PM 08:49"},{"MessageType": 2,"Content": "나도 내일이 괜찮을 것 같아.
